info.title: CN Intacct Marketplace Scraper
info.description: Searches the Sage Intacct Marketplace (UKI view) by keyword and returns listing HTML for Copilot to analyse.

get.description: Returns a list of marketplace listings whose name matches the given keyword. Each result includes full HTML of the listing detail page as raw_html.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword or phrase describing the solution you want to search for, e.g. 'AP Automation', 'Cash Flow', 'OCR'.

name.description: Listing name as shown in the marketplace.

raw_html.description: Full HTML content of the listing detail page. Copilot should read this to understand capabilities, benefits and approved countries.
